key.name: applications
key.description: List of all applications registered for using notifications.

key.name: vibrate-silent-mode
key.summary: Should Vibrate When in Silent Mode
key.description: Defines if applications can use vibrations to notify when system is in silent mode.

key.name: enable-notifications
key.description: Defines if application can use any supported notification type. This option has precedence over others options.

key.name: use-sounds-notifications
key.description: Defines if application can use sounds to notify users.

key.name: use-vibrations-notifications
key.description: Defines if application can use vibrations to notify users.

key.name: use-bubbles-notifications
key.description: Defines if application can use Notification Bubbles to notify users.

key.name: use-list-notifications
key.description: Defines if application can show messages in the Notification List.
